_comment: Example config for Anytime Fitness Jabalpur — used as reference for future clones
hero_description: At Anytime Fitness Jabalpur, Hathital, the support is real and it starts the moment we meet. Our coaches develop a plan that fits you — a total fitness experience designed around your abilities, your body, and your goals.
about_description: Join our community and get a personalized plan that works the way you want. Your plan will contain a 360 approach to your health with coaching, nutrition guidance, and 24/7 access to our premium facility.

amenities.title: Strength / Free Weights
amenities.desc: Barbells, dumbbells, circuit/selectorized machines, and a full plate-loaded rack system.

amenities.title: Functional Training
amenities.desc: Battle ropes, BOSU balls, kettlebells, TRX suspension, and plyometric boxes.

amenities.title: Cardio Zone
amenities.desc: Elliptical cross-trainers, exercise cycles, rowing machines, and treadmills.

amenities.title: Zumba & Dance Fitness
amenities.desc: High-energy group sessions including Aerobics, Zumba, and Dance Fitness classes.

amenities.title: 24-Hour Security
amenities.desc: Train at any hour with peace of mind. Full CCTV coverage and electronic access control.

amenities.title: AF Coaching App
amenities.desc: Connect with your coach anytime, anywhere. Get nutrition guidance and workout tracking.

testimonials.quote: Best gym in Jabalpur! The 24/7 access is a game-changer for my schedule. The coaches really care about your progress.
testimonials.author: Saurabh M.

testimonials.quote: The Zumba and Dance Fitness classes are absolutely amazing! High energy, great music. I've lost 8kg in 4 months.
testimonials.author: Neha R.

testimonials.quote: Clean facility, professional staff, and the app integration makes tracking so easy. Worth every rupee.
testimonials.author: Vivek P.

pricing.name: Pro
pricing.desc: Full coaching and class access included.

page_title: Anytime Fitness Jabalpur | 24/7 Gym in Hathital
meta_description: Welcome to Anytime Fitness Jabalpur, Hathital. Your neighborhood 24-hour gym. Whether you're a beginner or a fitness regular, we'll help you get to a healthier place.
